title: Prime Elysium Kottawa
details:
“Prime Elysium Kottawa” is situated 1.5 Km away from Kottawa town, this is an attractive land hosting all the modern conveniences such as reputed schools , hospitals, supermarkets , pipe born water and electricity, facing to 138 (Mattegoda main Bus route).
This is located in a serene location surrounded by beautiful paddy fields, eye catching lush of greenery surroundings and the property comprises of all amenities which are required for a luxury lifestyle. Highly residential gated community with 24 hour security, common area including a walking path, a gymnasium and a swimming pool.
Its full potential is ideal for anything, a home, a boutique or anything in between
The prestige neighborhood will lead esteem lifestyles in Kottawa and a great living community.
